name: Healthier Easy Sugar Cookies
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: I love this recipe. I could eat at least ten in one sitting which is why I exchanged some butter with non-fat plain yogurt. They still taste great and I feel a lot better about eating so many.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Stir flour, baking soda, and baking powder in a small bowl
Beat butter, yogurt, and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until smooth
Add egg allowing it to blend into butter mixture
Mix in flour mixture until just incorporated
Roll dough into walnut-sized balls and place 2-inches apart onto ungreased baking sheets
Bake in preheated oven until golden, 8 to 10 minutes
Let stand on baking sheet two minutes before removing to cool on wire racks
